name: Volley Blood
description:
Save the world from the Wall of Flesh by playing... Volleyball???

Volley Blood is a small arcade game created for the  Wowie Jam 4.0 on Game Maker Studio 2, the theme was "Cooperate with an AI".

I did everything by myself and didn't use any assets.   

The game ended up being way more complicated than i thought so there is an ingame tutorial to understand everything. 

I also made the music myself, you can listen to that right here:

There are still some things I could of done better, the ball behaves kinda weird and sometimes there are attacks you cannot dodge but i didn't have enough time to polish all of that.
But overall i'm pretty happy with the game :)
